definition: Chinese toon (Toona sinensis)/tree of heaven (Ailanthus altissima)/(literary metaphor) father

sentences.english: Contains an alkane that is the major product of the red-banded stinkbug's scent gland?
sentences.chinese: 一種紅帶椿象的氣味腺的分泌物？

sentences.english: Stink bugs have destroyed her entire grape harvest.
sentences.chinese: 她種植的葡萄幾乎全部毀於椿象。

sentences.english: Outbreaks have invaded homes and offices in many states.
sentences.chinese: 在許多州，椿象已經入侵人們家中和辦公室。

sentences.english: The larvae devour the stink bug from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲從內而外吞噬椿象。

definition: Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)
Orthoptera (insect order including grasshoppers, crickets and locusts)
Hemiptera (suborder of order Homoptera, insects including cicadas and aphids)
Homoptera (insect suborder including cicadas, aphids, plant-hoppers, shield bugs etc)
looper caterpillar, larva of moth in family Geometridae/inch worm
Hymenoptera (insect order including ants and bees)
